articles.title: Cardi B is every inch the doting mother as she brings her son Wave to SZA's concert in New York City - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 30-year-old performer appeared to be making the most of her time at her former collaborator's performance, and she also brought her son Wave, aged one, to Madison Square Garden.
articles.content:
Cardi B shared several photos and a video that had been taken during her time at SZA's concert at Madison Square Garden, which took place on Saturday night.

articles.title: Ellen DeGeneres and YouTube star Sophia Grace Brownlee welcomes baby - Daily Mail
articles.description: YouTube star Sophia Grace Brownlee, 19, has given birth to her first child, sharing a picture of her newborn's hand on Instagram on Sunday.
articles.content:
